articles.author: Marketing O'clock - Your Weekly Digital Marketing News Podcast
articles.title: Marketing O'Clock - Your Weekly Digital Marketing News Podcast - Zero Clicks, Lots 0' Drama: A Look at New SERP Data
articles.description: Building a community on Facebook turns out to be a recipe for disaster for the New York Times, Twitter addresses widespread user complaints (though not the one you’re thinking of), and things get inten(t)se over zero-click search data.
